About

A dive in the world of food to explore this Italian cuisine popularly known as Pizza. A world-famous dish with different variants in each corner of the world.A small initiative to explore and spread more and more about it.

Sometimes it feels like every cuisine has its origin, history and a life lived to be explored.This time exploring pizza, next time maybe something else.

Show some love and give feedback. Always open for suggestions.
Suggestion/Feedback

You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.

Yogi Berra, The Wit and Wisdom of Yogi Berra, P. Pepe, Diversion Books, 2014
